(vertigo) Paroymsal Positional Vertigo.remedy: Perform Epley maneuvers; avoid sudden head movements; stay hydrated.

AIDS.remedy: Adhere strictly to antiretroviral therapy (ART); maintain hygiene and nutrition.

Acne.remedy: Wash face twice daily; apply topical benzoyl peroxide or retinoids.

Alcoholic hepatitis.remedy: Abstain from alcohol; follow liver-friendly diet; take medications as advised.

Allergy.remedy: Use antihistamines; avoid triggers; consider nasal spray if needed.

Arthritis.remedy: Apply heat/ice; do gentle exercise; take NSAIDs as prescribed.

Bronchial Asthma.remedy: Use inhalers as prescribed; avoid triggers; monitor symptoms.

Cervical spondylosis.remedy: Do neck exercises; apply heat packs; take NSAIDs as required.

Chicken pox.remedy: Use calamine lotion; take paracetamol; avoid scratching lesions.

Chronic cholestasis.remedy: Follow low-fat diet; take cholestyramine or ursodeoxycholic acid.

Common Cold.remedy: Rest; hydrate; use decongestants or saline nasal spray if needed.

Dengue.remedy: Stay hydrated; take paracetamol only; monitor for warning signs.

Diabetes.remedy: Monitor blood sugar; exercise; restrict carbs; take medication as prescribed.

Dimorphic hemmorhoids(piles).remedy: Increase fiber; take warm sitz baths; consider topical creams.

Drug Reaction.remedy: Stop suspected drug under doctor guidance; take antihistamines or steroids.

Fungal infection.remedy: Apply antifungal cream twice daily; keep area dry and clean.

GERD.remedy: Elevate bed head; avoid spicy/fatty foods; take antacids or PPIs.

Gastroenteritis.remedy: Stay hydrated; use oral rehydration salts; rest and avoid dairy.

Heart attack.remedy: Chew aspirin; call emergency services immediately; hospitalize.

Hepatitis A.remedy: Rest; hydrate; maintain hygiene to prevent spread.

Hepatitis B.remedy: Follow antiviral treatment; avoid alcohol; rest and hydrate.

Hepatitis C.remedy: Take direct‐acting antivirals; monitor liver function regularly.

Hepatitis D.remedy: Manage underlying Hepatitis B; follow specialist advice.

Hepatitis E.remedy: Rest; hydrate; maintain food and water hygiene.

Hypertension.remedy: Reduce salt; exercise; take BP medication as prescribed.

Hyperthyroidism.remedy: Take antithyroid medications; have regular endocrinologist checkups.

Hypoglycemia.remedy: Eat quick carbs (juice/sugar); follow with complex carbs or a snack.

Hypothyroidism.remedy: Take synthetic thyroid hormone daily; monitor TSH levels.

Impetigo.remedy: Apply topical antibiotic ointment; keep lesions clean and covered.

Jaundice.remedy: Rest; hydrate; follow a light diet; treat the underlying cause.

Malaria.remedy: Take antimalarial drugs promptly; use mosquito protection.

Migraine.remedy: Avoid triggers; lie in a dark, quiet room; take NSAIDs or triptans.

Osteoarthristis.remedy: Do gentle joint exercises; apply heat; take pain relief suits.

Paralysis (brain hemorrhage).remedy: Seek emergency care; follow rehabilitation program in recovery phase.

Peptic ulcer diseae.remedy: Use PPIs or H₂ blockers; avoid NSAIDs; eat small, frequent meals.

Pneumonia.remedy: Take prescribed antibiotics; rest and hydrate; monitor breathing.

Psoriasis.remedy: Use topical steroids or vitamin D creams; moisturize regularly.

Tuberculosis.remedy: Follow full course of anti-TB drugs under supervision.

Typhoid.remedy: Take appropriate antibiotics; stay hydrated; practice hygiene.

Urinary tract infection.remedy: Take prescribed antibiotics; drink plenty of water; maintain hygiene.

Varicose veins.remedy: Elevate legs; wear compression stockings; exercise regularly.
